title: too much lag spike!
body: While I am playing ranked game, I've notice that my base ping is 90 ms and for ever 4 minutes or so, ping keep spike to 140~ 900!  Thanks to the lag spikes ( and high pings to start with) I just can't seems to win any ranked game, along with other factors (team throwing games, just having a bad match etc)... what can I do? uninstall?{{champion:17}}

replies.body: Oof, that's a problem.  No worries, though, I'm betting this is being caused by packet loss which can be fixed!  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to really know for sure though by getting an overview of your impacted games.  The results should also provide some troubleshooting steps specific to you, but let me know what you find!
My  CONNECTION SCORE is poor: 60. They suggest that I should try wire connection. However,  my living situation does not allows to be connected internet through wire. Are there any other option?

Ah, a wired connection could help a lot here.  You can try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network and wi-fi, but trying a wired connection could help rule out possibilities.
